main.name: Ido Oren
main.occupation: People Person and also full stack developer
main.bio: Hello. my name is Ido. Over a decade of Sales Management experience with a proven track record of exceeding sales targets in the Automobile industry.Extensive experience in Business development, team building and leading, and Customer Service.Training specialist with experience in technical aspects of product and sales methodology and Managerial leadership courses qualified.  A recent graduate of the Coding Academy Israel making me a certified Full Stack Developer after 640 intensive hours of coding and loving it. Developer at heart with a clear passion for coding. experience in writing single-page-applications using the latest WEB technologies such as Node.js, Vue.js, Vuex, React, Redux, Angular and MongoDb, PHP, Myphpadmin!
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: B.A in Government, Diplomacy and Strategy.

skills.description: Js was my first programming language that I started using. It is by far the language I am most familiar with.

skills.name: React Js
skills.description: I am new to React and really like it at first. It has grown on me though and I will continue to use it going forward. I have built a ReactJS based resume-website template.

skills.name: Sap crm
skills.description: Worked 8 years with Sap crm, trained new Sales representetive.

projects.title: Watchat
projects.category: A React + Redux application to watch movies and chat online with others using SOCKET IO. and a server side using mongodb, deploy with HERUKU.

projects.title: Mistertoy - inventory manager
projects.category: A React + Redux, React-Router,Soket, react-toastify,react-chartjs-2 application to mange (add,edit) inventory , Geoloaction, Google maps.

projects.title: Misterbooks
projects.category: A Vue application using router,fontawsome library, google books api, add, edit, reviews.

testimonials.text: How I live the sale cycle, Approach Each Customer With The Idea Of Helping Him Or Her To Solve A Problem Or Achieve A Goal, Not Of Selling A Product Or Service also If I won't Take Care Of my Customer, the Competitor Will.
During 9 years in the Automobile, I served more than 13500 customers, sold more than 65,000,000 NIS.
